name: Multiple Files for Contact Form 7
author: D001928403

sections.description: It is add multiple file upload capability to Contact Form 7. You may also attached the files to the sent email. You will reveive all files same.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire multiple-files-for-contact-form-7 folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find the ‘multiplefile’ tag as you create your form.
sections.faq:
1. Will it work with other form plugins except from CF7?
    No

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the entire multiple-files-for-contact-form-7 folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find the ‘multiplefile’ tag as you create your form.
sections.changelog:
1.0.

  • Added a filter on the frontend input field

1.0.0

  • Initial release
